title: Shadow
description:
Having powers doesn't always make you the heroÂ 



I am a Xenocrate. This makes me what some might consider "special" - and everyone wants to be special, right? 





It means I was born with powers, but these powers come with a price. The price is one that my mother, among many, has had to pay. For this reason, I went from a modern day Robin Hood, to a lawless villain. 




I am Delaney Benson. I am the Shadow, and this is my story.
author: Kayla Erickson
